history.proof: unfold eqTerm. induction n. - unfold eqTerm; intros contra. shelve. - unfold eqTerm in *. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros a b c H1 H2 H3 contra_eq_mult.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon 0 -> mon 0 -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon 0, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon 0) (zero_mon 0) ltM (mult_mon 0) gb := fun H' : mon 0 * bool => let (_, b) := H' in b : mon 0 * bool -> bool gm := fun H' : mon 0 * bool => let (m, _) := H' in m : mon 0 * bool -> mon 0 contra : Term A 0 The term "eqA_dec" has type "forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}" while it is expected to have type "nat".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply (divTerm_compo _ _ _ nO nO0 nR nR0) in H6.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
gb: mon n * bool -> bool
gm: mon n * bool -> mon n

Goal:
forall a b c : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c a) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b

Premises:
zeroP : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
eqTerm : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d

Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
A_sep : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0

Inductive divP : Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop := divTerm_def : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> divP a b

divTerm_eqT : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> forall nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc) c)
divA_multA_comp_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA a (divA b c nZc))
divP_ind : forall P : Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop, (forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> P a b) -> forall t t0 : Term A n, divP t t0 -> P t t0
divP_sind : forall P : Term A n -> Term A n -> SProp, (forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> P a b) -> forall t t0 : Term A n, divP t t0 -> P t t0
T1_multTerm_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
mk_clean : forall a b : mon n, {c : mon n * bool | c = div_mon_clean n a b}
T1_multTerm_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a)
nzeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
zeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
divTerm_compo : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c), divP a b -> divP b c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc))
eqTerm_divTerm_comp : forall (a b c d : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c) (nZd : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) d), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (divTerm b (b:=d) nZd)
divTerm_ppc : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm c (b:=a) nZa) a) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm c (b:=b) nZb) b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm c (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))
divTerm_multTermr : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) b
invA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b)
divTerm_multTerml : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) a
divTerm_def : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> divP a b
divTerm_dec : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)}
multA_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a)
plusA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c0 d)
multA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c0 d)
divTerm_on_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
ppc_multTerm_divP : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (ppc a b)
eqT_divTerm_plusTerm : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) (b:=c) nZc) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc))
divP_ppcr : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (ppc a b) b
multA_A1_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a
divP_comp_ppc0 : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> forall nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b), list (Term A n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=a) nZa))
divP_ppcl : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (ppc a b) a
multA_invA_com_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA (invA a) b) (invA (multA a b))
multA_A1_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA (multA a A1) a
divP_comp_ppc1 : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)), list (Term A n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=b) nZb))
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
divTerm_on_plusM_minusM : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a = mult_mon n (div_mon n (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b)) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)

```coq
intros a b c H1 H2 H3 contra_eq_mult.
unfold not in contra_eq_mult.
apply contra_eq_mult; clear contra_eq_mult.
unfold eqTerm.
induction n.
- unfold eqTerm; intros contra.
  apply (nzeroP_comp_eqTerm _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ cs eqA_dec) in contra.
  destruct H1; assumption.
- unfold eqTerm in *.
  inversion H1; subst; clear H1.
  inversion H2; subst; clear H2.
  inversion H3; subst; clear H3.
  pose proof (divP_multTermr _ _ nO nO0) as div_mult.
  apply (divP_comp _ _ _ _ _ _ div_mult) in H6.
  apply (divTerm_compo _ _ _ nO nO0 nR nR0) in H6.
  apply (eqTerm_divTerm_comp _ _ _ _ nO nO0).
  apply IHn; assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b c H1 H2 H3 contra_eq_mult. unfold not in contra_eq_mult. apply contra_eq_mult; clear contra_eq_mult. unfold eqTerm. induction n. - unfold eqTerm; intros contra. apply (nzeroP_comp_eqTerm _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ cs eqA_dec) in contra. destruct H1; auto. - unfold eqTerm in *. inversion H1; subst; clear H1. inversion H2; subst; clear H2. inversion H3; subst; clear H3. pose proof (divP_multTermr _ _ nO nO0) as div_mult. apply (divP_comp _ _ _ _ _ _ div_mult) in H6. apply (divTerm_compo _ _ _ nO nO0 nR nR0) in H6. apply (eqTerm_divTerm_comp _ _ _ _ nO nO0). apply IHn; auto.
